snippet: Fighting back tears, President Obama declared that the hearts of Americans were “broken” in the wake of the shootings in Connecticut and he said the country must “come together to take meaningful action” to prevent future tragedies.
abstract: Fighting back tears, President Obama declared that the hearts of Americans were “broken” in the wake of the shootings in Connecticut and he said the country must “come together to take meaningful action” to prevent future tragedies.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Fighting back tears, President Obama declared that the hearts of Americans were “broken” in the wake of the shootings in Connecticut and he said the country must “come together to take meaningful action” to prevent future tragedies.

headline.main: Obama Responds to Connecticut School Shooting
